page.title: 19A HOLIDAY IN ROTTINGDEAN
page.content: The visitor has a wide choice of accommodation from the humble Bed and Breakfast and pleasant guest houses to the relative luxury of the White Horse Hotel adjacent to the beach. It is best to rise fairly early and enjoy the relative quiet of the High Street with its residents going about their daily business. Low tides bring out the beachcomber in us all. Sunny days invite the sunbather and swimmer. But when strong winds blow the scene is most dramatic. Waves blow on to the coast and the unknowing visitor will easily become soaked with sea spray. Gift shops provide the opportunity to delight one's relatives and remind one of happy days by the Sussex coast.
